name: Easy Digital Downloads Product Slider
author: wpbean

sections.description:
This plugin will add a responsive product slider to your Easy Digital Downloads site. Highly customizeable. Touch device friendly. It will help you to raise your conversion rate.

  • Upgrade to the Pro Version Now!
  • View a live demo
  • Support
  • Documentation

Plugin Features

  • Product carousel.
  • Showing image price and cart button in carousel.
  • Flat and modern responsive design.
  • Shortcode easy use.
  • Tons of shortcode attributes.
  • No need any settings.
  • Easy to use.
  • Developer friendly & easy to customize.
  • SEO friendly.
  • Touch device friendly.
  • Powered by OWL-Carousel.
    & many More

Pro Features

  • Product slider for specific categories.
  • Product slider for specific tags.
  • Product slider for specific products by id.
  • Featured product support.
  • Product slider for featured products.
  • Related product slider support.
  • Also avaiable related product shortcode.
  • Exclude products by categories, tags, id.
  • Control number of product to show in phone, tab, small screen.
  • Image height & width define feature.
  • Product order & orderby.
  • Translation Ready.
  • Advance options panel.
  • Well documentation and support.
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Active the plugin.

  • Use this [wpb-edd-slider] shortcode, where you need to show the product slider slider.
sections.faq:
I use shortcode but it’s not showing the slider?

Make sure you put the shortcode in text mood.

Slider not looking as it’s swhown in demo?

We test the plugin with all default theme, if your theme css conflict with the plugin style you may need to edit the plugin css. You can add your css code on main.css file.
sections.changelog:
version 1.0

  • Initial release

version 1.01

  • WordPress 4.9 support added.

version 1.02

  • Added WordPress 4.9.6 support.

version 1.03

  • Added WordPress 5.1.1 support.
  • Added Easy Digital Downloads 2.9.12 support.
  • Performance improved.

version 1.04

  • Added WordPress 5.2 support.
  • Added Easy Digital Downloads 2.9.12 support.

version 1.05

  • Tested with WordPress 5.6

version 1.06

  • Tested with WordPress 5.6.1

version 1.07

  • Tested with WordPress 5.6.2

version 1.08

  • Tested with WordPress 6.4.1 and EDD 3.2.5

upgrade_notice.1.03: After updating the plugin, make sure you clear your browser cache.
